A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is no longer a space opera.
At least JJ Abraham's was decent\, still not excellent. But this one is just wrong in so many levels. I hate you Disney.

Mess of a plot. Super forced jokes. Forced love just like GoT's Jon Snow and Draenerys. Unacceptable First Order VS alliance space 'battle'. Unlogical speed. Leia's force use is just dull and dumb\, 70s movie had much better effect.

Every other movie was more targeted to a more mature audience. This one targets newborns.
